episodes.title: From Cult-Controlled to CEO: The Power of Choosing Again
episodes.description: Jasmine Chambers had built what looked like a faithful life: leadership roles, four children, community respect. But beneath the surface, she was dreaming of disappearing. Raised in a highly-controlled religious environment that would later be classified as a cult, Jasmine had learned to silence her inner voice and follow external authority. Until the night she and her husband loaded their four children into a truck and drove toward the unknown. It’s a story rooted in the messy, years-long work of undoing a lifetime of conditioning while simultaneously building something entirely new. From getting her high school diploma at 31 to launching a luxury home-building company, Jasmine reveals the real cost of living someone else's version of your life, and the power that comes from choosing your own dreams, again and again. Key Timestamps: [00:00:00] Introduction. [00:03:42] The power of choice. [00:08:38] Parenting in a strict community. [00:10:38] Internal conflict and personal growth. [00:16:30] Finding a place to belong. [00:18:11] Journey to personal empowerment. [00:22:34] Marriage growth through personal development. [00:27:44] Trusting your roots and growth. [00:29:03] Wasted time misconception. [00:34:27] Empowering others to achieve dreams. [00:35:58] Living in alignment. Memorable Quotes: "I started to really firmly believe in the power of choice because I saw how it changed our lives." [00:03:52] – Jasmine Chambers "So many people just live these dreamless lives, but we were created to dream and to dream big dreams. And that's what makes the world so beautiful." [00:34:08] – Jasmine Chambers Discover your Business Growth Archetype in under 8 minutes and get instant clarity on what’s driving or stalling your growth. Walk away with a clear snapshot of your business and practical next steps you can use this week to grow smarter and faster.
